p: Figure 6 describes the microarchitecture of the pancreas in the experimental animals. In diabetic control group, a significant reduction (78.08%, P < 0.001) in the Langerhans islets size was observed compared to normal control as shown in (a). The administration of the plant extract significantly increased the Langerhans islet size with dose-dependant effect at 50 mg/kg (65.80%, P < 0.05), 100 mg/kg (67.75%, P < 0.05), and 200 mg/kg (72.3% P < 0.01).
